title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18ยง 225.2 - Action by board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18ยง 225.2 - Action by board

State Regulations

Unless otherwise required by statute, whenever any
provision of the rules requires board approval or other board action, such
approval or action may be executed by the board, or at the board's discretion, by any designated committee or designated member thereof, by the executive
director, or by designated staff employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18ยง
225.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
